Israeli military says it killed 'significant' Hamas member in Lebanon strikeThe Israeli military said it killed Hamas member Hadi Ali Mustafa in southern Lebanon on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:25:57 GMT NCMLTJHR3RIPJOXCO6RTIMZA5I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-it-killed-significant-hamas-member-lebanon-strike-2024-03-13/Reuters世界中东
Cubans await promised government intervention as peso slides furtherThe Cuban government has promised to take decisive action this month to halt a slide in the peso that has wiped out savings and left Cubans struggling to afford basic goods, but economists Reuters spoke to were skeptical of a quick fix. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:23:10 GMT PKE7OHTSRRIU7FW3PSW2DZQCTI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cubans-await-promised-government-intervention-peso-slides-further-2024-03-13/Marc Frank世界美洲
US Treasury's No. 2 urges South Africa to boost fight against corruptionU.S. Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo on Wednesday urged South Africa to step up its battle against corruption, saying that work could help boost job creation in a country facing an unemployment rate of 43% among those under 35. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:02:56 GMT 5EEOJVBM5FM3TJPM2LGDYBAYSI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-treasurys-no-2-urges-south-africa-boost-fight-against-corruption-2024-03-13/Andrea Shalal世界
Exiled Navalny aide warned of danger hours before hammer attackHours before an assailant attacked him with a hammer and tear gas outside his home in Lithuania, the top aide to late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny told Reuters he and other exiles feared for their lives. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:00:54 GMT RBEQVJ62O5IWTKKXDXGZKWYRBU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/exiled-navalny-aide-warned-danger-hours-before-hammer-attack-2024-03-13/Andrius Sytas世界欧洲
UK Conservative party may accept more money from donor in racism row, minister saysBritain's governing Conservative Party might accept financial support from its biggest donor in the future despite him becoming embroiled in a row over racism, a minister said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:59:22 GMT L3FFZQVD45KUTLESKJVCTYTGPA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-conservative-party-may-accept-more-money-donor-racism-row-minister-says-2024-03-13/Alistair Smout世界英国
Indonesian state banks to provide $1.84 bln of loans to secure food suppliesIndonesian state banks will provide loans subsidised by the government to food procurement companies to ensure adequate supplies of rice and other staples, as harvests were disrupted by prolonged dry weather, an official said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:47:01 GMT ITUIYONCJRNL7FBQKZYP6ULJNE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-state-banks-provide-184-bln-loans-secure-food-supplies-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nepal PM wins parliamentary vote of confidence, third in 14 monthsNepal's Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal won a parliamentary vote of confidence on Wednesday, a week after he formed his third coalition in just over a year to head a government which is dominated by the liberal communists. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:43:15 GMT PJZ5D52IPFMPDCBRXK4VLPVIIU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nepal-pm-wins-parliamentary-vote-confidence-third-14-months-2024-03-13/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Poland's capital Warsaw earmarks $30 million for bomb shelters and other securityPoland's capital Warsaw will spend 117 million zlotys ($30 million) in the next two to three years on bomb shelters and other security measures, with war in neighbouring Ukraine in its third year, the city's mayor said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:26:11 GMT T6TDF4PCHVJ6XOXIH54GEWMQHU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polands-capital-warsaw-earmarks-30-mln-bomb-shelters-other-security-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Bird flu strain raises alarm as virus kills South American wildlifeThe deadly H5N1 bird flu virus has spread more aggressively than ever before in wild birds and marine mammals since arriving in South America in 2022, raising the risk of it evolving into a bigger threat to humans, according to interviews with eight scientists. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:05:04 GMT ZQP2LTQ3CZJFXKUQTCNZF6AVPY https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/bird-flu-strain-raises-alarm-virus-kills-south-american-wildlife-2024-03-13/Jake Spring商业环境
Greta Thunberg blocks Swedish parliament again, removed by policeSwedish police on Wednesday again forcibly removed Greta Thunberg and other climate activists who were blocking the entrance to parliament, driving them away in a police van for the second time this week. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 09:54:14 GMT华星光电43WATZLELPBC66BBEE6MQU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-again-remove-greta-thunberg-blocking-swedish-parliament-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli forces kill two Palestinians in West Bank raid after deadly nightIsraeli forces killed two Palestinians during a raid in the occupied West Bank early on Wednesday, the official Palestinian news agency WAFA reported, bringing to five the number of Palestinians killed in different incidents within several hours. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 08:42:19 GMT MDVVBUW7NRKUFIL7NQNYBUYRA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-kill-two-palestinians-west-bank-raid-after-deadly-night-2024-03-13/Raneen Sawafta世界中东
